siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Today I am going to be Draining an Ocean Monument in my Minecraft Hardcore Lets Play! I Drained an Ocean Monument in Minecraft and it took me about 16 hours! If you want to figure out how to drain an ocean monument in minecraft make sure to watch this video until the end!

In the next episode I'll be transforming the ocean monument, make sure to leave a comment on how I should transform it!

WATCH THE SERIES FROM EPISODE 1:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7z9MJwIFnY&list=PLXYjxAo4KISJqoE1rkt3OXmM5rCrstpoV

If you enjoyed this video, check out this one:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i5zqq646MMY\
"I Transformed the NETHER into the OVERWORLD in Minecraft Hardcore (#36)"

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

localize.title: 我在Minecraft Hardcore中排出了一个海洋纪念碑(#37)

在下一集，我将改造海洋纪念碑，一定要留下评论，我应该如何改造它!

previous.excerpt:
Thanks to Monster Legends for sponsoring! Don't miss out on the limited time Marley monster available until March 29th  - https://monsterlegends.onelink.me/X4Sc/Marley

Rainbow Six Siege has just updated to Operation Crimson Heist, the star of Year 6! Could it be another year of waffling with the boys? Hitting cheater like champion one taps? Clutching on the Border rework with an ace? Or maybe looking for new black ice skins in alpha pack openings... All I know, is we'll be vibing with the new operator, Flores! And his drone looks OP!

localize.title: 25分钟的彩虹六号围城VIBING。
localize.description:
感谢《怪物传说》的赞助! 在3月29日之前，千万不要错过限时提供的马利怪物--https://monsterlegends.onelink.me/X4Sc/Marley。

彩虹六号围攻》刚刚更新到第六年的明星--"深红劫行动"! 会不会又是一个和男生打打闹闹的年头? 打骗子一样的冠军一拍？用王牌紧紧抓住边境重做？又或者是在阿尔法包开局中寻找新的黑冰皮肤... ... 我只知道，我们会和新的操作者Flores一起活力四射! 而且他的无人机看起来很OP!

localize.title: 25分鐘的彩虹六號圍城VIBING。
localize.description:

next.excerpt:
New York City is one of the most wasteful cities in the world. But none of its trash is actually processed in NYC. It's sent to waste-to-energy facilities and landfills as far away as Ohio and South Carolina. It takes a vast network of sanitation workers, trucks, trains, cranes, and barges — and $429 million a year — to get it there.

MORE BIG BUSINESS VIDEOS:
How 800 Million Pounds of Himalayan Salt Are Mined Each Year | Big Business
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h23rF0xrhTE
How Chefs In The NBA Bubble Make 4,000 Meals A Week | Big Business
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RkBFVR7lfj8
How The World's Largest Airplane Boneyard Stores 3,100 Aircraft | Big Business
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mYsOFXnfsCU

------------------------------------------------------

localize.title: 紐約市320萬噸垃圾怎麼辦？
localize.description:
纽约市是世界上最浪费的城市之一。但它的垃圾没有一个是真正在纽约市处理的。它被送到了远在俄亥俄州和南卡罗来纳州的废物转化为能源的设施和填埋场。这需要一个庞大的环卫工人、卡车、火车、起重机和驳船网络，以及每年4.29亿美元的资金，才能将垃圾运到那里。

更多大企业视频。
每年8亿磅喜马拉雅盐是如何被开采出来的｜大生意网
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h23rF0xrhTE
厨师如何在NBA的泡沫中一周做4000顿饭｜大生意--------。
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RkBFVR7lfj8
世界上最大的飞机骨架库如何储存3100架飞机｜大生意--------。
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mYsOFXnfsCU

localize.title: 紐約市320萬噸垃圾怎麼辦？
localize.description:
紐約市是世界上最浪費的城市之一。但它的垃圾沒有一個是真正在紐約市處理的。它被送到了遠在俄亥俄州和南卡羅來納州的廢物轉化爲能源的設施和填埋場。這需要一個龐大的環衛工人、卡車、火車、起重機和駁船網絡，以及每年4.29億美元的資金，才能將垃圾運到那裏。
